name: Lost in a Dream (Geistder)
description:
A short game where you are stuck within a fever dream. The only way to escape is by navigating the maze your character's mind created! 

Use the arrow keys to move and the space bar to advance dialog. I apologize for the small text. 

This was done for the  "My First Game Jam". It is both my first time using 3D in Gamemaker as well as signing up for a Game Jam. Overall wanted to add more but I want to move on to other projects.
